Articles.Content: Would it be at all possible to make the LK fuel tanks surface attach? It's extremely annoying to have to use those decouplers to attach something I don't intend to decouple .

engines need alittle more tweaking I think. and we need to make bigger launch vehicle tanks. there are ways to get it there none cheat. but for the larger KVTK tanks I would just use the cheap menu

I hope making them more fuel efficient myself--I might just be bad at this, but for the great stability, I always seem to not have enough delta v to get an orbit with a large payload. They've got plenty of power--at least, the conventional ones do--but that comes to an abrupt end too early!

Would it be at all possible to make the LK fuel tanks surface attach? It's extremely annoying to have to use those decouplers to attach something I don't intend to decouple .

As long as you're coupling to an LK tank core, they attach just fine without decouplers. What are you trying to do with them?
Woah boy. It's been a quite a while since then.
quite a bit. Will need to... revamp the front page :/

New thread.
